name: S P A C E D O U T
name_original: S P A C E D O U T
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for LD47. 

I hope you enjoy it.

Come hang out at our daily game development streams: https://www.twitch.tv/lana_lux

INSTRUCTIONS: 
WASD to walk, SHIFT to run, Left mouse button to interact with things.
Try to earn enough credits to upgrade your FTL from your fabricator. Once you do, use it to return home.

Select your work station to work and earn credits. Each task takes a period of time.

You must sleep by 12AM and regardless of when you go to sleep, you will wake up at 8AM.



Note: Updated the broken radio switch and second FTL upgrade.
